plot: Three roommates, one gay, one high and one cool, going through their thirties and the mishaps that the Los Angeles dating life brings in.
plot_en: Three roommates, one gay, one high and one cool, going through their thirties and the mishaps that the Los Angeles dating life brings in.
plot_es: Three roommates, one gay, one high and one cool, going through their thirties and the mishaps that the Los Angeles dating life brings in.
title: Currently Cool
